Poker.io

Class HtmlUserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • Poker.io.HtmlUserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInterface<HtmlUserInterface>

    public class HtmlUserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface<HtmlUserInterface>
    Implementation of the generic user interface used for the interaction with the user with an Html file.

      • roundToHtml

        private java.lang.String roundToHtml(Game<HtmlUserInterface> game)
        This function serializes the entire game state to html.
        Parameters:
        game - Game object from which data should be extracted
        Returns:
        String that contains the game state and is a complete Html document
